overview: From 2025-01-16 to 2025-01-17, elizaos/eliza had 46 new PRs (33 merged), 10 new issues, and 83 active contributors.

completedItems.title: feat: add instagram client
completedItems.body:
# Risks

Low, is a new client, does't have any impact on old code.

## What does this PR do?

Implements a new Instagram client for ElizaOS that:

1. Handles Instagram authentication and session management
2. Provides media posting
